name: Bad Juju (ethonk)
description:
Survive under the mercy of a greedy god!

You are given a chance to redeem yourself to ascend from the mortal world. To pass the test you must not only survive, but please and provide for your God who watches over you. Using your knowledge of cooking and crafting, fulfill desired bounty of the earth!

Developed by Boy ScoutZ

Ethan Uy
Lead Developer, Project Manager

Cory Marsh-Nichols
Programmer of Core Mechanics
